channel.title: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy
channel.description:
I've just accepted it, I make scores essentially. So with that in mind here's my first take on the ultimate HYPER VILLIAN themes. The villains have always been more interesting to me anyways.
https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/hero-crusher ![IMG_0519|375x500](upload://uIi4TZ7ktQOXijBe1gWLulFcpQl.JPG)

item.title: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
Greetings fellow outlier. Nice work! I admire your commitment to your art, and look forward to seeing where you go with this series.

Read full topic
item.source: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy

item.title: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Thanks, hopefully if all goes well I’ll put some animations to this new direction. Just epic and dirty destruction. Over the top is what I’m aiming for. I can’t beat the trap or dub enfiendatos, so I’ll just be louder and heavier.

Read full topic
item.source: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy

item.title: Hero crusher - by Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: TMAR
item.description:
This Idea is awesome man! Very original. I think you’ve really captured the character in the music and it sounds bad ass! Good job mate.

Read full topic
